description: Returns basic details about an entity in WorkMail.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the entity exists.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email under which the entity exists.

nested_items.name: EntityId
nested_items.description: The entity ID under which the entity exists.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Username, GroupName, or ResourceName based on entity type.
